docblock.description: * HTML template rendering engine for 'maps.kp-wiki.org' * * @link https://kp-wiki.org/ Knights Province fan community * @author Thimo Braker <thibmorozier@gmail.com> * @version 1.0
* Array of values, the keys should match the tags in the template files
* Sets a value for replacing a specific tag
* Outputs the content of the template, replacing the keys for its respective values

docblock.description: * PBKDF2 key derivation function as defined by RSA's * PKCS #5: https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2898.txt * * $algorithm - The hash algorithm to use. Recommended: SHA256 * $password - The password.
docblock.long-description: * $salt - A salt that is unique to the password. * $count - Iteration count. Higher is better, but slower. * Recommended: At least 1000. * $keyLength - The length of the derived key in bytes. * $rawOutput - If true, the key is returned in raw binary format. * Hex encoded otherwise. * Returns: A $keyLength-byte key derived from the password and salt. * * Test vectors can be found here: https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc6070.txt

docblock.description: * Compare the given password and salt with the given hash * * $password - The raw password to compare with * $salt - The salt to use for the comparison * $hash - The hash to compare against * * Returns: A boolean to indicate if the password with salt is equal to the hash
